d490a814-ea49-4614-8fe4-920d43a8cd52.description: The Partner of the Year award honors top-performing partners that have demonstrated outstanding business performance and excellence in the sales and delivery of Optimizely solutions. d490a814-ea49-4614-8fe4-920d43a8cd52.name: Solution Partner of the Year

badge_template_activities.title: The Partner of the Year award honors top-performing partners that have demonstrated outstanding business performance and excellence in the sales and delivery of Optimizely solutions. These partners have made the most significant contribution to the success and growth of Optimizely over the past year.

8d3efa7f-f01b-4932-a885-f0990289661d.description: This award is presented to the Optimizely customer who delivers exceptional ecommerce solutions to help their customers buy products and services seamlessly, allowing them to engage intuitively with the brand.
8d3efa7f-f01b-4932-a885-f0990289661d.name: Best B2C Buying Experience

badge_template_activities.title: - Leveraged customer insights and data to inform their overall strategy, - Demonstrated how this strategy has informed the development of their solution design, - Improved customer satisfaction, engagement, leads, or sales generated through their solution, - Demonstrate how this solution has supported their overall marketing strategy.

3921c526-7f50-4393-8cb5-fd88ec02090e.description: This award is presented to the Optimizely customer who has created an exceptional commerce experience—one that best combines engaging buying and self-service solutions with rich content that is relevant to the personas they serve.
3921c526-7f50-4393-8cb5-fd88ec02090e.name: Best Buying Experience

badge_template_activities.title: - Leveraged customer insights and data to inform their overall strategy, - Improved customer satisfaction, engagement, leads, or sales generated through their solution, -Increased digital revenue

ed7fd327-2175-4fb9-b7f1-8837257b9ed9.description: This award is presented to the Optimizely customer who runs stellar experimentation programs, demonstrating strong data-driven approaches to solve real customer problems and drive impactful business decisions.
ed7fd327-2175-4fb9-b7f1-8837257b9ed9.name: Best Experimentation Practice

badge_template_activities.title: - Use Web Experimentation, Full Stack or both products​, - Source and test ideas for experimentation, - Solve customer problems through running experiments, - Evangelize experiment results throughout the business, inspiring a culture of experimentation, - Drive business outcomes through data-driven testing

e9c016f4-6ac2-4d0e-adc0-5d17db12fa65.description: This award is presented to the Optimizely customer who runs stellar experimentation programs, demonstrating strong data-driven approaches to solve real customer problems and drive impactful business decisions.

b58d53c6-7ad0-4a7b-994b-229bd3e19a9f.description: The Commerce Partner of the Year category focuses on the adoption of Optimizely’s B2B and/or B2C Commerce Cloud through solution partners. These partners are top drivers of Commerce Cloud adoption and have successfully implemented data-driven digital commerce solutions that resulted in sustained ecommerce growth for clients.
b58d53c6-7ad0-4a7b-994b-229bd3e19a9f.name: Commerce Partner of the Year

badge_template_activities.title: The Commerce Partner of the Year category focuses on the adoption of Optimizely’s B2B and/or B2C Commerce Cloud through solution partners. These partners are top drivers of Commerce Cloud adoption and have successfully implemented data-driven digital commerce solutions that resulted in sustained ecommerce growth for clients.

848cf1f3-f4cc-436b-b615-30c56bc74eaa.description: The DXP Partner of the Year category focuses on the adoption of the Optimizely Digital Experience Platform (DXP) through solution partners. These partners are top drivers of DXP adoption and have successfully implemented DXP solutions that yielded significant business results and drove long-term growth for clients.
848cf1f3-f4cc-436b-b615-30c56bc74eaa.name: Digital Experience Solution Partner of the Year

badge_template_activities.title: The DXP Partner of the Year category focuses on the adoption of the Optimizely Digital Experience Platform (DXP) through solution partners. bf9e69fa-0fc8-4f14-bb56-9215989c223a.description: The Experimentation Partner of the Year category focuses on Optimizely projects that drive experimentation, optimization and personalization. These solution partners have successfully implemented or maintained digital experimentation solutions that enabled clients to deliver customer-centric digital experiences that drove engagement and significantly boosted conversions.
bf9e69fa-0fc8-4f14-bb56-9215989c223a.name: Experimentation Partner of the Year

These solution partners have successfully implemented or maintained digital experimentation solutions that enabled clients to deliver customer-centric digital experiences that drove engagement and significantly boosted conversions.

f50b9200-7b1b-4229-8ccf-48627bb7666b.description: This award is presented to the Optimizely customer that has leveraged the Optimizely Content Cloud platform to its full potential and has built and maintained an outstanding customer-centric experience for end users.
f50b9200-7b1b-4229-8ccf-48627bb7666b.name: Most Customer-Centric Experience

badge_template_activities.title: - An overall exceptional website experience built with Content Cloud, - Customer-centric, behavior-driven experiences, ideally by using CMS functionalities such as Visitor Groups and Search & Navigation, - A personalized end user experience, - Online community building and collaboration amongst editors, for example by using the Projects functionality in the CMS, - Integrated social media solutions, a sophisticated mobile strategy and use of search marketing tactics

7d77d4d4-2aed-42f9-a595-5fe76d79f33b.description: This award is presented to the Optimizely customer that has solved a complex business challenge or met a market demand in a new and exciting way. Leveraging innovative strategies, this company has created customer-centric, behavior-driven experiences, anticipated customer needs, and has created an overall exceptional website experience.
7d77d4d4-2aed-42f9-a595-5fe76d79f33b.name: Most Innovative Digital Experience

badge_template_activities.title: - Use Content Cloud or Commerce Cloud, - Use at least one other Optimizely product, -​ Create an exceptional website experience, - Push boundaries with innovative content, - Deliver customer-centric, behavior-driven experiences, - Facilitate online community building and collaboration, - Anticipate customer needs.

37daf871-f183-4780-aff2-d8e6da0f78b4.description: The Industry Solution Award honors a technology partner that is changing the way organizations leverage data to unlock digital potential. badge_template_activities.title: The Industry Solution Award honors a technology partner that is changing the way organizations leverage data to unlock digital potential. This partner has proven mastery of the art and science of data-driven decision-making in their work, helping companies optimize customer journeys and drive significant business impacts.

dddf9175-1765-48d0-a42f-ed1f73d505a0.description: The Optimizely Technology Partner Program is designed to help technology providers uncover growth opportunities by delivering more integrated solutions that meet the critical needs of customers. This program enables organizations to extend their market reach and connect with a larger audience while empowering them to drive innovation with confidence.
dddf9175-1765-48d0-a42f-ed1f73d505a0.name: Optimizely Platinum Technology Partner

badge_template_activities.title: Signed partner agreement
W-9 and W-8BEN tax forms
25 annual active customers using integration
$600,000 annual revenue commitment or a minimum 6 referred deals

3137d968-3dde-4651-bd3a-366ff5586e86.description: The Rising Star Partner of the Year award recognizes emerging solution partners that are making exceptional efforts in collaborating with Optimizely to deliver innovative digital experience solutions.
3137d968-3dde-4651-bd3a-366ff5586e86.name: Rising Star Technology Partner of the Year

badge_template_activities.title: The Rising Star Partner of the Year award recognizes emerging solution partners that are making exceptional efforts in collaborating with Optimizely to deliver innovative digital experience solutions.

75dd5469-fb98-4403-9a56-ced5a1fb4931.description: This award is presented to the Optimizely customer who creates B2B digital experiences that best combine an engaging buying and self-service experience, with rich content relevant to the B2B personas they serve.
75dd5469-fb98-4403-9a56-ced5a1fb4931.name: Best B2B Buying Experience

badge_template_activities.title: - Purpose-built B2B commerce experiences, -Increased digital revenue, -Decreased cost to serve through self-service capabilities, - Personalized B2B experiences

c3cc3c85-cd24-4e7b-a1a5-10db259bc191.description: This award is presented to the Optimizely customer who has created an exceptional commerce experience—one that best combines engaging buying and self-service solutions with rich content that is relevant to the personas they serve.
c3cc3c85-cd24-4e7b-a1a5-10db259bc191.name: Best Buying Experience

badge_template_activities.title: - Leveraged customer insights and data to inform their overall strategy, - Improved customer satisfaction, engagement, leads, or sales generated through their solution, -Increased digital revenue

2d19b221-11cd-4a33-b9ee-eed7fee59d0a.description: This award is presented to the Optimizely customer who runs stellar experimentation programs, demonstrating strong data-driven approaches to solve real customer problems and drive impactful business decisions.
2d19b221-11cd-4a33-b9ee-eed7fee59d0a.name: Best Experimentation Practice

badge_template_activities.title: - Use Web Experimentation, Full Stack or both products​, - Source and test ideas for experimentation, - Solve customer problems through running experiments, - Evangelize experiment results throughout the business, inspiring a culture of experimentation, - Drive business outcomes through data-driven testing

dbd395be-a041-4352-93bd-7a578fe7ae52.description: This award honors a technology partner who demonstrates commitment and the potential for long-term excellence within the digital experience category, significantly contributing to joint customers' positive outcomes to improve digital experiences.
dbd395be-a041-4352-93bd-7a578fe7ae52.name: Best Technology Partner Newcomer

badge_template_activities.title: This award honors a technology partner who demonstrates commitment and the potential for long-term excellence within the digital experience category, significantly contributing to joint customers' positive outcomes to improve digital experiences.

85331e78-d1ae-49a0-9aa6-afe8e40b80d4.description: The Digital Experience Technology Partner of the Year award honors a technology partner that has excelled in delivering applications and integrations that help Optimizely customers meet their unique digital experience needs, empowering them to build a smarter tech stack that enables advanced personalization.
85331e78-d1ae-49a0-9aa6-afe8e40b80d4.name: Digital Experience Technology Partner of the Year

badge_template_activities.title: The Digital Experience Technology Partner of the Year award honors a technology partner that has excelled in delivering applications and integrations that help Optimizely customers meet their unique digital experience needs, empowering them to build a smarter tech stack that enables advanced personalization.

c004a47a-b3c1-407f-9a95-6e79c8f02fd6.description: This award is presented to the Optimizely customer that has leveraged the Optimizely Content Cloud platform to its full potential and has built and maintained an outstanding customer-centric experience for end users.
c004a47a-b3c1-407f-9a95-6e79c8f02fd6.name: Most Customer-Centric Experience

badge_template_activities.title: - An overall exceptional website experience built with Content Cloud, - Customer-centric, behavior-driven experiences, ideally by using CMS functionalities such as Visitor Groups and Search & Navigation, - A personalized end user experience, - Online community building and collaboration amongst editors, for example by using the Projects functionality in the CMS, - Integrated social media solutions, a sophisticated mobile strategy and use of search marketing tactics

9152f1ab-6e20-45af-8458-55cd7dd3f2a2.description: This award is presented to the Optimizely customer that has leveraged the Optimizely Content Cloud platform to its full potential and has built and maintained an outstanding customer-centric experience for end users.

66a1e6e9-b0df-4c7f-95a7-150b5874a37c.description: This award is presented to the Optimizely customer that has solved a complex business challenge or met a market demand in a new and exciting way. Leveraging innovative strategies, this company has created customer-centric, behavior-driven experiences, anticipated customer needs, and has created an overall exceptional website experience.
66a1e6e9-b0df-4c7f-95a7-150b5874a37c.name: Most Innovative Digital Experience

badge_template_activities.title: - Use Content Cloud or Commerce Cloud, - Use at least one other Optimizely product, -​ Create an exceptional website experience, - Push boundaries with innovative content, - Deliver customer-centric, behavior-driven experiences, - Facilitate online community building and collaboration, - Anticipate customer needs.

321eefa2-11fc-4478-ac90-6e14da9c7b4a.description: An Optimizely Experimentation Strategist Subject Matter Expert (SME) has expert level knowledge, training and experience defining and managing products through the lifecycle of an experiment using Optimizely's experimentation product. This SME also provides insight and guidance for Optimizely’s Experimentation Strategist certification exam.
321eefa2-11fc-4478-ac90-6e14da9c7b4a.name: Optimizely SME Experimentation Strategist

badge_template_activities.title: Subject matter experts are required to submit an application to be a part of the program.
Experience working with Optimizely Experimentation
Active participation on SME technical panels and advisory committees.
Gold status indicates that the SME has participated in the required projects and collaborated beyond expectations in the SME program.

18e55b71-d81f-4f92-a6aa-536a8fb4a7d9.description: An Optimizely Experimentation Web Platform Expert Subject Matter Expert (SME) has expert level knowledge, training and experience developing and deploying features and experiments using Optimizely experimentation products.
18e55b71-d81f-4f92-a6aa-536a8fb4a7d9.name: Optimizely SME Experimentation Web Platform Expert

ef3c343a-420d-46c4-93be-12041ebf847d.description: The Partner of the Year award honors top-performing partners that have demonstrated outstanding business performance and innovation in partnership with Optimizely solutions. These partners have made the most significant contribution to the success and growth of Optimizely over the past year.
